column4: I don't like what the bot has to say (^_^) i need help i did search and i found nothing

Note that a lot of people are trying to find answers in here. If people kept repeating their question, it would completely flood the channel. Give it some time, then ask again; I'm sure someone will know at some point. If your search still doesn't yield any response, try the !forums.
Not a problem at all; we're here to help. :)
